commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add task and print list

commitResults.messageBody:
User can add todo (just task name),
deadline (name + due date),
event (name + start + end time).

Todo, Deadline, and Event have common behaviours
such as markAsDone() and markAsIncomplete().

The common behaviours cause code duplication.

Extracting the common behaviour into a super class
Task allows us to use polymorphism when manipulating
the tasks in a single todolist.

Let's modify the parent class Task to be abstract
so that it will not be instantiated.

Let's extend the parent class task to implement
different types of task to utilise inheritance.

Update to common behaviours will be done in a
single place which is the parent class Task.

Use exceptions to display error message for users.

Use try-catch block places error handling logic in
a single code block to reduce reduplication of code.

Let's pull up exception classes related to invalid
task inputs into a new parent class named TaskExceptions
to standardise error message and instructions given to users.

Let's pull up all exception classes uses in Bee
into a new parent class name BeeExceptions to
maintain consistency of wording by the chatbot.

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: Handle invalid index using exception
test: Semi-automate testing with I/O redirection
fix: Handle invalid task indices that are not int feat: Provide user guid with 'help'
